title: Janus
creator_credit: Anthony Wilkinson, Michael Birkett and James Garrett and Partners
brief_description: This film was made for the European Architectural Heritage Year and has no spoken commentary. It considers the character of the European heritage, its neglect through indifference and its destruction through vandalism throughout the ages.
creator_credit_for_label: Anthony Wilkinson, Michael Birkett and James Garrett and Partners
